website_summaries.verdict: A basic but cute mobile that won't appeal to all parents but is a nice accessory for sea-themed nurseries.
pros: Features adorable sea creatures with cute expressions
Easy to put together and use
Made by a top name in baby products, and matches the brand's sea collection for nurseries
cons: Pricey yet basic, as it only plays one song and requires frequent rewinding
Not as practical for boys as others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Wanted more for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros—adorable, easy to assemble and install, and it’s very sturdy Cons—it gets stuck on the monkey. If another half inch had been planned in the design of the arch, the animals would rotate freely. It’s such an easy design fix, which is why it’s so frustrating. (The arch is hard plastic; I can’t bend it). Also, if I completely turn the music dial, the music doesn’t last more than a couple minutes. I wouldn’t recommend this. It’s adorable, but for the price, it needs to be functional.
customer_reviews.author: JENNA G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product and not worth $40 each at all! We have twin girls so we bought two, but this product isn’t worth it. It’s wind up and only plays one song. The song only last a couple minutes too. Design is awful as the animals get stuck on the arm as they move around. It’s 2018, a battery powered mobile would be much easier. Giving it two stars because we used it for two nights and the girls thought the little animals were completely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: El vaqero

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY DO NOT WASTE 1.00 ON THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: How royally stupid. Who designed this and WHY are you selling these POS flawed mobiles to people for their babies. It cant turn you cheapos tried to save .001 cents on plastic and it cant turn the little toys get stuck. Selling these is utterly ignorant and rude. Dont let them spit on your face too...DO NOT BUY....NOT EVEN FOR 1.00 ITS WORTHLESS.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Our babies love watching it
customer_reviews.text: Very, very cute. Only problem is one must be forced to continue winding up so the music will play. Our babies love watching it, and listening to the music; however, I am forced to stand above them (twins) and keep winding up the music so it continues. Why not just a battery operated tune player?
customer_reviews.author: Mellani

customer_reviews.title: Quality wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The monkeys and elephant kept getting stuck on the giraffe when they went around until I bent their tails/nose enough that they just bump off now. This is in other reviews and the product Q&A, but it's a wind-up mobile and doesn't last long at all. I was able to buy another motor that is battery-powered and lasts 30 minutes that fit just fine with this mobile. So my total cost for the mobile was more than I wanted to spend, but it works well now.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cute but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I had to use a twist tie to attach the music box portion to the connecting hook as the 2 pieces would not attach to each other. The directions are written in small print and not the most helpful anyway. The felt “leaf” covering looks cheap. The jungle animals hanging on the mobile are delightful. The music does not play for a long duration.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great for looks only.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe i just didn't read the description well, but i was surprised that this run by a wind mechanism. It doesn't play music/turn for very long and the music is loud with no way to soften it. The rails at the top of my son's crib are thicker than the thickness of the slats, so it hangs kind of crooked. The winding mechanism became damaged somehow within a few months of very little use. But it is very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Mainini

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck with the monkey and requires manual help to spin.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cute design. It’s unfortunate that the spin stops at the monkey. So the music continues but the animals are stuck ( not spinning). Such an easy design but a miscalculation on how far out the animals should be. Will be returning this product as I am over trying to spin the animals myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Poor description and doesn’t spin properly
customer_reviews.text: First of all I think the title should say that it’s for a girls nursery. The strings in the photo are white. When I got the mobile they were pink. I also couldn’t tell in small photo that the zebra was pink. It was ordered for a boy. I was willing to overlook that because he’s a baby and doesn’t know anyway. But the mobile gets stuck on the monkey. I am in the process of returning the mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This mobile is adorable but very cheaply made. The music box runs for a minute then it's done and it also SOUNDS TERRIBLE. When my kids were little the listened to their mobiles for 10-15 minutes and watched as the animals went around. This was one of the only ones I could find that had an actual music box and not some digutalnweird sound. But the music box part is awful. So bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Duby

customer_reviews.title: Worst mobile.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely outrageous for the price... It's a piece of junk and for $50!!!! It doesn't even have preset buttons you have to turn it to make the horrible cheap sound it makes that barely last for 3minutes... And above all else the design is flawwed! The animals on the mobile hit the giraffe pole and don't even spin in a circle you have to tilt it to the side if you even want it to move right which in my opinion is a safety hazard for my son so I don't. Over all this mobile is a $15-$18 value and I paid over $50 after shipping and handling for this piece of junk, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine if you lift the giraffe's neck
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get this for $5 thanks to the rest of you review-bombing this product. If assembled as intended, it functions poorly and gets stuck. However, it only requires a few minor tweaks, and it will run beautifully. Mainly, you just need to lift the giraffe's neck so that the other animals don't get stuck on it.
customer_reviews.author: HSuke

customer_reviews.title: Super cute - no automation
customer_reviews.text: In the process of returning this. I’m actually really disappointed to have to return but this did not meet expectations. This is actually a manual wind up mobile. No automatic features or remote. The wind up for ours came broken out of the box as well so it’s just a useless, crazy adorable decoration right now.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnsicle

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and my twins love it, but the part that makes it spin and plays music is cheap and only worked for about 10 minutes. You have to wind it up and then while it plays music it CLICKS so loudly we can hear it clicking from the other room. I bought a separate motarized battery operated spinner and am hoping that it’s higher quality. The animals are cute though, but overall it’s fairly cheaply made. I expected better from Carter’s.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Not gender neutral - pink and loud
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize this had so much pink in it. Bows, string and a pink zebra... I ordered this for my son's crib. The winding feature is a pain. Music only lasts for 2 minutes. Music is cute but no volume options so its pretty loud. Easy to install, my son was mesmerized but I wish it was more gender neutral. Will most likely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hansen House

customer_reviews.title: Pretty under the sea option
customer_reviews.text: Love this soft and feminine under the sea mobile. Good quality compared to others with the same theme. I upgraded the music wind up piece with an affordable $10 one from amazon that last longer and can have music added to it. Overall, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ashleybrooke525

customer_reviews.title: I like that the sticker is optional because I was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Using it in my feather themed gender neutral nursery. I like that the sticker is optional because I was not a fan of that part. I also like how easy it is to assemble but sturdy enough that my toddler can’t fiddle with it and get it off the crib. My favorite part: there’s a switch to activate the song and spinning. I can pre wind it and then turn on when needed.
customer_reviews.author: The Haas Family

customer_reviews.title: cute but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This mobile is cute and and keeps my baby somewhat entertained. However, when it is going the little animals often get stuck when they go by the giraffe's neck and we have to keep going over to push them to pass it. We have rigged it so it happens less often, but it takes away from the cuteness and they still get stuck some of the time. This is the only mobile we have tried, but I am sure there are better ones out there. Not going to return but would suggest trying a different one if you are in the market for a mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I’m not too happy with my purchase because when the top part spins , one of the animals get stock and does not spin while the music is going. I think picture looks Better than actual item.
customer_reviews.author: shirin

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute design, the giraffe neck arm looks fun on the crib in our jungle themed nursery. The only complaint is that the animals on the mobile hang a little too close to the arm, so free movement is limited because the monkeys graze the arm and mobile stops moving. Overall, I really like the look of it and the music is nice too. It is easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: milana dudits

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was pretty straight forward and there is a little button to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this mobile. It didn’t fit on his crib because it has unusually thick bars on it so I attached it to his hanging table and he immediately stops crying when I crank it up and let it play. Assembly was pretty straight forward and there is a little button to stop it from spinning and playing music if you overwind it and want it to stop playing before it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: MsV8r

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend NOT buying this!! So bad!!
customer_reviews.text: I should not even be giving this one star, this is so horrible for the price! I highly recommend not buying this! The leaf is so cheap, the amount of work you have to put into winding it up for it to spin and when it does spin the animals get caught on the giraffes neck!! For $50 I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I might’ve received a faulty one.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one at Macy’s and wanted a second one but it was $52 so I bought this one because it was way more affordable. I would give this a 5 star but the music seems to be a little off compared to the first one I bought. I’m not sure if I received a faulty one but it sounds like one note is off. Thankfully my newborn doesn’t notice/cares so I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great product however the melody does not play long, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great buy, and great price! Only reason getting a 4 star is because the melody does not play very long at all, kinda disappointing. Goes great with our little mermaid under the sea theme in our baby's room though!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product. The music goes way too fast ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product. The music goes way too fast so it doesn't last long at all. It's cute but I need something that ladts longer and it's very loud. It should have different settings for speed and volume. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: brandee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It came with a broken hook, also animals keep getting stuck to a giraffe so It's useless. It's not worth the money anyway, it's cheaply made. Didn't expect that from Carter's, I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bojan

customer_reviews.title: Well this was less than climactic
customer_reviews.text: I expected a working mobile for 50 bucks! It winds up but it doesn't play music or turn. I got it, pulled it out of the box, put it together and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Doesnt function.
customer_reviews.text: I like the brand Carters for clothing, however for this mobile it was terrible. The song only plays for about 30 seconds, the animals get stuck on the pole, and according to the instructions you are supposed to thread the animals to the hanger part but the string to the animals is sewed shut.
customer_reviews.author: Kmic

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but wish the music box played longer so I didn’t have to keep winding it to keep my baby happy. Looking into buying a replacement music box. But I bought the crib bedding set that matches this so I do want to keep the same mobile itself.
customer_reviews.author: JJo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 uses. Not really functional.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very cheap. You have to turn a dial to make it rotate and play a song. The song maker broke after just a few uses (lost one note at a time in sound box). And, even after turning the dial around the max amount (about 20 turns) the movement and song ends after about 1 minuet of playing. This means you have to keep running back to keep baby entertained. This is total garbage. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mehh
customer_reviews.text: mehh, returned it, looked cheap.. Only one song and it sounded horrible. Sorry..just trying to steer people in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The animals don't face baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. My only complaint is that the animals are facing the parent, not the baby
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressive
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the parents to be had chosen the mobile. However, I was disappointed in the product. It was blah and uninteresting, not enough color or activity to entertain a child.
customer_reviews.author: gailb

customer_reviews.title: Wind up only lasts a few min
customer_reviews.text: This is a wind up mobile It turns off after 4 min Spent another 20 bucks and bought a battery operated one that runs for 30 min. Also didnt realize from picture this is for girls
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Fun !!  Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased as my daughter and son in law are as well. Very cute , sweet and it will be in the crib very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Condro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This mobile is cheap and ineffective. The wind up music box only turns for a few minutes. We will be returning it and urge potential buyers to look elsewhere. A battery powered mobile is a must - trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth like 10$.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably worth like 10$ :/ the leaf is cheap looking. FOR GIRLS ONLY... Not unisex. And where the giraffe goes on the stick looks all loose and the head always falling sideways just looks blahh. And have to wind it up like every 2 min. No thanks :(
customer_reviews.author: Kalissa Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, low quality mobile. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaply made disappointing toy. I wouldn't think Carter's would allow something this bad into their product line, but then I'm not sure if this is genuine Carter's anyway. The music is out of tune as well. For this price you can get a decent battery-powered mobile with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Tigran Petrossian

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws, cute if you can fix it!
customer_reviews.text: Poor design - animals get caught in the neck, and the wind up motion is a pain as only lasts a couple of minutes. I Jerry-rigged the mobile to stop the catching and changed out the sound and motion portion to battery operated. Drastic improvement and now my babies love it!
customer_reviews.author: CliveF

customer_reviews.title: Mobile with a weird noise
customer_reviews.text: The item plays a weird noise between the song is supposed to be playing and the song is missing a note too. Looks good but it doesn't sound good. They send me a replacement and it sounds better but still has the noise on the background
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap. Very expensive for what you get. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel begley

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this one
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this one...he likes to watch these when falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: amruta giri

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and was very happy with it when I unboxed it. It is so cute and soft. But I have no way to hang it up the look that is supposed to b on the top isn't there at all it's just a pink line.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorably cute mobile but the music sounds a little creepy - like a music box you would hear playing in a scary movie or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy f

customer_reviews.title: Cuter than the one offered with our bedding set
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t installed yet. Nursery still in progress. Waiting for furniture. Much cuter than the one that was offered with the bedding set.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Decker

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE:  Does not play/run any longer than about 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's nursery and it matches the jungle baby theme perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C 5586

customer_reviews.title: Chime Missing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mobile, but the wind-up chimes don’t last long enough and the highest pitched chime doesn’t chime at all. So the melody is incomplete in three places. Our son doesn’t seem to mind, though! We’ll teach him the melody when he’s older, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute for a little boy's nursery! My kiddo loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and Adorable ♡♡♡!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Baby but music box did not work but it didn't matter it was cheaper here than every where else...I just bought a music box from Amazon that plays over 60 songs way better than the one it came with...but the product over all is super cute for our babies mermaid and friends theme♡
customer_reviews.author: paloma rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and not too hard to install. I did not realize from the picture that it is meant for a girl's room, not gender neutral like I thought. I removed the bows and used it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Cris P

customer_reviews.title: and babies love it. Bad part about this is that music ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, and babies love it. Bad part about this is that music must continually be wound up to continue playing. 5-6 full winds supplies about 1 minute of music. Why not a battery operated unit so the music keeps playing??
customer_reviews.author: Mellani

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for your little one
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is 4 months old and she loves this mobile. Cutest little song and she loves watching it going around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but not put together right. Sewn so you cant fix.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Harden Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cute ocean themed
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, my daughter loves it but was able to reach it in her crib.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Guptaitis

customer_reviews.title: Cute but crappy quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute mobile but the quality isn’t the greatest. The green leaf is made of a felt material that doesn’t fit very well and the giraffe fabric doesn’t attach to the arm and the head is constantly falling over. Overall, it’s cute and fits our nursery theme but I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Sasser

customer_reviews.title: Cut a
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mobile! However when we got it sent to us from Amazon as a gift, one of the monkeys strings was cut and it's uneven now. Other then that we highly recommend it. Super cute goes woth anything woodland theme or jungle like.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk
customer_reviews.text: This is what happens when engineers design products. What could have been one piece turns into 3, the bold part had inner and outer threads...why? The parts are so cheap they feel like they’ll shatter trying to snap it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned item ....it's a boy and strings were pink...but it was beautiful for a girls room
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: He loves it so much, he cries when it ...
customer_reviews.text: He loves it so much, he cries when it goes off. We do not turn on all the time, it has spoiled him. It gives his parents a few minutes of heaven. Loving Grandmother.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Poon.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but costly
customer_reviews.text: Wish I wouldn’t have paid so much for this simple mobile. It cranks/windes up, not electronic. Doesn’t not play for very long. It’s cute but not worth $60!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: The music is a bit on the loud side. Volume can’t be controlled. Cheap material. Overal cute colors.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. The mobile was super flimsy and got stuck every time. It is also really fast. The song stops after 15 seconds, and it is a wind up so you have to go back each time to keep doing it. Not great.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This looks adorable hung up on our crib. It can be rewound and last for up to 5-6 minutes at a time and my daughter loves to lay there and listen and watch it go 'round. Great sound quality, too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This product would be so much better if it were battery operated instead of a wind up. It stops so quickly so unless you want to have to rewind over and over again, I’d look elsewhere. If you don’t mind, my baby loves when it’s playing music/spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi Miller

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 11 week old loves it. Only 3 stars because it has to be wound constantly and the octopus arms without attachments are droopy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Its very cute its on my daughters bed. I turn it on when I need to clean or do something real fast and she will just lay there and stare at it. Its a little hard to get the pieces together but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra H.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $10
customer_reviews.text: Worst mobile... defective... spent $50 for a wind up mobile that gets stuck on the monkeys and elephant
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Helps baby sleep
customer_reviews.text: This helps our little one fall asleep - The music is relaxing, however the animals will only spin around until the monkeys tails get caught on the stand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really good my baby loves it and laugh all the time
customer_reviews.author: Hooman

customer_reviews.title: Broke!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my product today. The mobile is broken. I took apart the musical mobile and the spring and two other pieces are completely disconnected. When I purchased this it said it was used-like new condition. Since when did like new condition become broken?! Now I’m trying to google how to fix the spring, that way my baby will be soothed to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Excited to find a match
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Matched nursery perfectly. Boxed well and arrived quickly. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barb C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute it works welll but sometimes the music plays double
customer_reviews.author: hyacintha diaz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if the music played a little longer. Very nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Music box came won’t wind spring bad if I return price goes up to re buy
customer_reviews.author: Aretha Vansickle

customer_reviews.title: Loose on crib
customer_reviews.text: This product appears great at first glance. But when I went to fit it onto the crib it is loose and I will need to make adjustments so that it will fit snugly. I would be worried that baby would pull it down from inside the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not well made mechanically
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts were not so easy to put together but overall recommended. However cute it stopped working in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in person. I hope it works for more than a year since some of the other reviews seem to suggest that it breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The music is not too loud and the colors are just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Cute carter mobile. Everything I expected. The music is not too loud and the colors are just like the picture. Fits an old crib too
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: wind up music type
customer_reviews.text: love the way it looks. just wish it was battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Hector L Perez

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it & the fact it was easy to put together is definitely a plus
customer_reviews.author: Dahiani

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Parts were missing for this. What a disappointment. I was really looking forward to its arrival and adding it to my nursery.
customer_reviews.author: HP27

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Music is off tune and lasts for less than a minute. When assembled properly the blades that hold the animals/palm leaves are too long to spin. extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Watley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mobile!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful! My daughter loves it! Good quality product! Only issue is that to keep the mobile moving you need to be constantly winding it up.
customer_reviews.author: SOL R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Love how beautiful it looks and easy it was to put together
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro villalobos

customer_reviews.title: great price compared to toys r us and babies are
customer_reviews.text: Cute , great price compared to toys r us and babies are us
customer_reviews.author: Interior Designer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My sons nursery room is all about ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My sons nursery room is all about frogs and bees and ducks and turtles so this was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: leona cee

customer_reviews.title: Important buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughters room. She loves it falls right to sleep listening to the music great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We all voted &....it's a 5*
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift & everyone loved the mobile! It looked well made & little animals are NICE! We ALLvoted...it's a 5*
customer_reviews.author: Okie Karma

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was really cute, but the music box is off tune. It sounds kind of creepy.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, easy to assemble and install, simple wind up mechanism, my daughter loved it right away. A little pricey for being analog.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't play long enough
customer_reviews.text: The music and mobile do not play or spin long enough for baby to be happy
customer_reviews.author: Sickat420

customer_reviews.title: It looks great in the nursery
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in the nursery. Definitely the most fun ocean themed mobile we could find. The mechanical music box in it is a bit loud for my tastes, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Kious

customer_reviews.title: Grandchild loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the mobile second grandchild second mobile The music box part didn’t last on first one.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Messina

customer_reviews.title: I will be returning - the animals touch the giraffe's ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning - the animals touch the giraffe's neck and sometimes stops. Music does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: MotherofJadaandJojo

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed how it couldn't work
customer_reviews.text: Machine to make it spin was broken. Super disappointed how it couldn't work.

customer_reviews.title: music box broke

product_meta.title: Carter's Sea Collection Musical Mobile, Pink/Blue/Turquoise
product_meta.description: Color:Sea CollectionCarter's sea collection musical mobile-this musical mobile will help soothe your little one to sleep, gently spinning while playing Brahms Lullaby. Babies slip into sleep under the watchful eyes of a smiling octopus, two fish, a crab, and a seahorse. Coordinates with a full line of Carter's sea collection nursery bedding and decor.
feature_bullets: Recommended age is from birth to 5 months, fits most standard and convertible cribs
